person.persName: Christopher Abel (Jefferson County, KY, grocer & flour dealer & grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, retail grocer and flour dealer. Native of Prussia. Married to Mathilde Abel. Father of Mary Abel and Christopher Abel. Retail grocer in Louisville in 1859. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1863.
